charges.charge_description: 18 USC 924(a)(1)(A) FALSE STATEMENT OR REPRESENTATION IN THE ACQUISITION OF A FIREARM(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Sentence to the B.O.P. for 15 months in count 1. No fine; No restitution; $100.00 S/A to be paid immediately; 3 years S/R with the standard conditions of probation. Defendant to voluntarily surrender as directed by the U.S. Marshal. Defendants rights explained and understood.

charges.charge_description: 18 USC 924(a)(1)(A) FALSE STATEMENT OR REPRESENTATION IN THE ACQUISITION OF A FIREARM(2)

18:922(a)(6) KNOWINGLY MAKE, IN CONNECTION WITH THE ACQUISITION OF A FIREARM FROM A FEDERALLY LICENSED FIREARMS DEALER, A FALSE WRITTEN STATEMENT TO SAID FIREARMS DEALER LIKELY TO DECEIVE SAID LICENSED DEALER WITH RESPECT TO A FACT MATERIAL TO THE LAWFULNESS OF THE SALE OF THE FIREARM UNDER CHAPTER 44, TITLE 18 UNITED STATES CODE
